00022 #ifndef _KITAOCELLISTENER_H_
00023 #define _KITAOCELLISTENER_H_
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/CelListener.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/GenderCelListener.h"
00029 #include "chipstream/KitAODb.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <utility>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 
00035 class KitAOCelListener : public ChipSummary, public CelListener { 
00036 public:
00037   enum {
00038     KIT_UNKNOWN=0,
00039     KIT_A=1,
00040     KIT_O=2,
00041   };
00042 
00043   KitAOCelListener();
00044   virtual ~KitAOCelListener();
00045   //
00046   void init();
00047   void clear();
00048 
00049   //
00050   void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel);
00051 
00052   // 
00053   void computeKitAO();
00054 
00055   //
00056   void setDb(KitAODb* db);
00057   void setLayout(ChipLayout* layout);
00058 
00059   // # The cutoff value (VAL) which will be used to classify Cels.
00060   // # Less than this negative value is KitA.  (id=1  [-inf..-KitA])
00061   // # In between is unknown.                  (id=0  (-KitA..+KITO));
00062   // # More than this postitive value is KitO. (id=2  [+VAL..+inf])
00063   // The database file must have a line like this:
00064   // #%classifier-cutoff-a-value=-3.31
00065   // #%classifier-cutoff-o-value=-1.34
00066   double getClassiferAValue() const;
00067   double getClassiferOValue() const;
00068 
00069   // what is passed into computeKitAO as member vars
00070   // we dont own this memory.
00071   KitAODb*    m_db;
00072   ChipLayout* m_layout;
00073   //
00074   std::string m_celFileName;
00075   std::string m_exprAnalysisString;
00076   std::string m_sketchFileName;
00077   // what is returned from computeKitAO as member vars
00078   int m_return_kit_id;
00079   double m_return_kit_value;
00080 };
00081 
00082 #endif // _KITAOCELLISTENER_H_
